original: 著《仇國論》虛構二國家，反對姜維連年北伐虛耗國力。精研六經、通曉天文，勸劉禪投降、預言司馬昭病逝。
text: "The Theory of Citizenship" fictionalizes two countries and opposes Jiang Wei's continuous Northern Expedition to waste national power. He studied the Six Classics and learned astronomy, persuaded Liu Chan to surrender and predicted the death of Sima Zhao.
